detail_desc: Set with a long-sleeved jersey top, corduroy shorts and a pair of fine-knit tights. Top with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back. Shorts with a fake fly, button at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Windbreaker in woven fabric with piping in a contrasting colour. Stand-up collar, detachable hood with a concealed hook and loop fastening and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners at the front. Press-studs at the sides, elastication at the back of the waist, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Fleece lining. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

High-waisted trousers in a wool weave with an extended waistband and pleats at the top. Zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, a flap back pocket with a button, and straight legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
Knee-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a high waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip in one side and a flounce trim down the front and around the hem. Unlined.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Strapless, lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust and silicone trims at the back. Side support and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short wrap dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.

Shirt in washed cotton twill with appliqués and printed text, and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline and front pocket. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and ribbing around the neckline and hems.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and inset mesh sections at the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Knee socks in a fine pointelle knit made from a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Joggers in soft velour with a ribbed drawstring waist, appliqué at the top and ribbed hems.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in soft, rib-knit viscose jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved jersey playsuit in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top and elasticated seam at the waist.
Adjustable necklaces in waxed cord with a metal pendant. Length approx. 60 cm.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in soft printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Anklets in different designs, one with plastic beads and one in metal chain. Adjustable length 22-25 cm.

Set with a dungaree dress and top. Dress in woven fabric with adjustable, frill-trimmed straps, gathered seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with narrow covered elastication at the cuffs.

Body in mesh and lace with a super push-up bra. Underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and pleat at the front. Long sleeves with two covered buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Boxy cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and ribbed hems.
Top in glittery sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and taped zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, an inner pocket, ribbed cuffs and concealed, covered elastication at the hem. Polyester filling.
Short top in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide ribbing at the hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top, mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Scrunchie covered in soft velour.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a gathered, elasticated neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small collar, V-neck and gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Sleeveless, one-shoulder dress in soft jersey. Wide flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a narrow shoulder strap over the open shoulder. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print pattern and a motif. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with a decorative metal button, zipped side pockets and a decorative tab and button at the sides. Lined.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Decorative buttons at the front and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Large scarf in a super-soft chunky weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 33x175 cm.
Print-patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Satin mules with a wide, padded foot strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck front and back, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, buttons down the front and a tie-detail hem.
Wide, padded fabric-covered Alice band with soft imitation suede on the inside.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, small embroidery detail on the chest and buttoned cuffs.

Long, double-breasted coat in jacquard-weave cotton with narrow notch lapels, a wrapover fastening at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, diagonal welt side pockets with a flap, one inner pocket with a button, and a single back vent. Lined.
Large metal hair grips in various designs, decorated with rhinestones, imitation pearls and plastic shells. Length approx. 6.0 to 6.5 cm.
Metal hair clip with a glittery decoration at the top and hair extensions. Length approx. 34 cm.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a polo neck, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Sweatpants in organic cotton jersey with elastication at the waist and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood with reflective details and a stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and wide, detachable belt. Concealed zip at the back and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Short, one-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour trims, covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front and short slits at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print pattern and a motif. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button. Side pockets, a coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.

Long dress in airy, patterned, lightly crinkled chiffon with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck, jersey underdress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Short skirt in jersey with shimmering details with an elasticated waist.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Slightly shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Blouse in an airy, weave with a V-neck, buttons and pin-tucks down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, short, flounced sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
